title: Zyena, The Elemental Hound[Champ Concept]
body:
**Stats:**
Health: 508 (+88 per level)
Health Regen: 5.84 (+0.65 per level)
Mana: 368 (+38 per level)
Mana  Regen: 8.09 (+0.65 per level)
Attack Damage: 60.3 (8.21)
Attack Speed: 0.665 (+3.2% per level)
Armor: 23.45 (+3.5 per level)
Magic Resist: 30 (+1 per level)
Movement Speed: 345

**Abilities:**
Passive - Hard as Rock
Zyena's skin is hard as rock. Any damage he takes will return 50% the damage and he will gain 5% movement speed for 3 seconds, and when the passive is back from cooldown he will be slowed for 50% for 3 seconds.
Cooldown: 24 sec

Q - Fiery Fangs
Passively:
Gains gains 10 attack damage permanently for every unique champions killed.
Active:
Zyena bites a unit dealing 14/18/22/26/30 AD (+10% of bonus AD), and will deal 6% of their maximum Health in magic damage over 2 seconds.
Mana: 20/40/60/80/100
Cooldown: 27/34/41/48/55

W - Freezing Claws
Zyena froze his claws and for 3 auto attacks the attack will slow for 10% for 5 seconds and deal 20/22/24/26/28 magic damage.
Cooldown: 18/26/34/42/50
Mana: 30/35/40/45/50

E - Sky Power
Zyena leaps to a target dealing 40/45/50/55/60 AD, if its an ally it gains 15/20/25/30/35 movementspeed for 15 seconds.
Cooldown: 30
Mana: 40

R - Elemental Power
Zyena unleashes his true power gets 20 movementspeed 10/30/50 AD 5/15/25 AP and all of his basic ability only have a 1 seconds cooldown.
Mana: 100/120/140
Cooldown: 115/130/145

replies.body: Way too op and a heap of plot holes

i think this is my first champ i make so sorry if OP
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

You can't be serious that you would want to play against that. Playing against that champ would be like 1 soraka against 5 illaois where your team is the soraka and the 5 illaois is zyena... but hey Scarizard will make it anyway

seems op XD
dont need another 1v5ing champ *cough* illaoi *cough*
